categorycode.description: patron category this rule is for (categories.categorycode)

itemtype.description: item type this rule is for (itemtypes.itemtype)

ccode.description: item ccode this rule is for (items.ccode)

permanent_location.description: item permanent location this rule is for (items.permanent_location)

sub_location.description: item sub location this rule is for (items.sub_location)

genre.description: item genre this rule is for (items.genre)

rentaldiscount.description: percent discount on the rental charge for this item

chargeperiod.description: how often the fine amount is charged

chargeperiod_charge_at.description: Should fine be given at the start ( 1 ) or the end ( 0 ) of the period

maxonsiteissueqty.description: total number of on-site checkouts allowed

issuelength.description: length of checkout in the unit set in issuingrules.lengthunit

hardduedatecompare.description: type of hard due date (1 = after, 0 = on, -1 = before)

renewalperiod.description: renewal period in the unit set in issuingrules.lengthunit

norenewalbefore.description: no renewal allowed until X days or hours before due date.

no_auto_renewal_after.description: no auto renewal allowed after X days or hours after the issue date

no_auto_renewal_after_hard_limit.description: no auto renewal allowed after a given date

holds_per_record.description: How many holds a patron can have on a given bib

hold_max_pickup_delay.description: hold max pickup delay in days

branchcode.description: the branch this rule is for (branches.branchcode)

overduefinescap.description: the maximum amount of an overdue fine

cap_fine_to_replacement_price.description: cap the fine based on item's replacement price

onshelfholds.description: allow holds for items that are on shelf

opacitemholds.description: allow opac users to place specific items on hold

article_requests.description: allow article requests to be placed,
